channel.title: Need VPS Help. We are buying. just need help putting server on it. Giving admin
channel.description: Need help on deciding which vps to get and how to set it up. We are buying the vps, just need some assistance on how to set it up. If you want we can give admin for the help. It would have to be over skype call.

item.title: Need VPS Help. We are buying. just need help putting server on it. Giving admin
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

Get a windows vps from vpsland or cobrahost.
Then you will get the ip which you can connect to your vps with and Username and Password for logging in. (You can use remote desktop computer to connect to it).
Then just upload your source using dropbox(recommended) and download it to vps and run the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need VPS Help. We are buying. just need help putting server on it. Giving admin

item.title: Need VPS Help. We are buying. just need help putting server on it. Giving admin
item.dc:creator: @duhstract duhstract
item.description:
@duhstract wrote:

[quote=“M.I.A., post:2, topic:438418”]I don’t mind helping you although i do own my own server, there is no need for admin. Add me on MSN, crypticdev@hotmail.com

MochaHost is preferable.[/quote]

Can you do Skype with me and the guy buying? Its greatly appreaciated

He didnt Respond so can anyone help?

Read full topic
